title: FORMING A SERIOUS TEAM High Bronze - Silver
body:
Hi guys, goosh here. Ive been hunting for teams for a while now and figured I would go after my own. My vision for this is to find a group of players of who can communicate, learn, grow, and win together. Even though this is a low elo team I strive to find players who have many qualities I believe can fit into a good healthy team environment. 

Please follow this format to its fullest,  I carefully read all comments posted.
